situation.title: Children's contact with their friends
situation.meta_description: Recommendations for children meeting their friends.

content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

Meetings are limited to 6 people max. Keep the distance of at least 2 meters with other people. According to the government regulations, contact with other people is strictly limited to the necessary occasions.

Although, online platforms do not replace personal contact a meeting is not recommended. When a meeting is necessary, choose outdoor areas and wear a face mask. You can find out more about meetings and relevant current measures in the section Meetings, parties, family celebrations.

Try to meet with your friends online. Help your kids to organise a phone call, play an online game together, or have a text conversation with their friends.

The current situation represents a huge strain on the mental health of all of us. Children perceive this stress very strongly as well as adults. Especially, if they are separated from their friends, grandparents and detached from the school or other environment. If your child is suffering from mental health problems due to the isolation, fear of illness or stress from current state, we recommend reviewing the Stress and Pandemic Impact Management.
